Eremites roam the planes to seek out ideal portions of other creatures, such as a hero's sword-arm or an angel's pinions. Eremites capture these specimens to clinically test their true limits, then harvest specimens and add them to their own bodies. An eremite might attach tongues to their hand as extra fingers or a fist to the back of their neck in a horrid “improvement.” Eremites average 7 feet tall and weigh approximately 200 pounds. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Eremite](/Monsters.aspx?ID=852) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 285 2.0 **Perception** +34; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), painsight, [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Shadowtongue](/Languages.aspx?ID=21); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +38, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +36, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +40, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +36, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +34, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +36, [Torture Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +36 **Str** +9 **Dex** +6 **Con** +7 **Int** +6 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +10 **Painsight** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) A velstrac automatically knows whether a creature it sees has any of the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11), and [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) conditions, as well as the value of those conditions. --- **AC** 45 **Fort** +37 **Ref** +32 **Will** +34 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 375 , regeneration 25 (deactivated by good or silver) **Immunities** cold, [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), nonlethal **Weaknesses** good 20, silver 20 **Ignore Pain** An eremite's actions can't be disrupted due to damage or Strikes (such as [Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)).
**Paralytic Perfection** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) 30 feet. When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it feels compelled to offer pieces of its own flesh to the eremite. The creature must succeed at a DC 40 Will save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 1 round. --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 50 feet **Melee** jaws +39 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 4d8+19 piercing plus 2d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and exquisite pain **Melee** claw +39 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d6+19 slashing plus 2d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), exquisite pain, and [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Divine Innate Spells** DC 42 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307) - **7th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Dimensional Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=71), [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to Material Plane or [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) only), [Shadow Siphon](/Spells.aspx?ID=274) (at will), [Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) - **9th** [Bind Soul](/Spells.aspx?ID=21), [Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×2), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×2), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273), [Shadow Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=275) (at will) - **Constant (9th)** [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Rituals** DC 42 - **8th** [Imprisonment](/Rituals.aspx?ID=13) **Evisceration** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Requirements** The eremite has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The eremite excises flesh or bone from a creature it has grabbed. The target takes 6d10 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). **Exquisite Pain** An eremite's knowledge of pressure points and pain centers is unsurpassed. A creature hit by an eremite's melee Strikes must succeed at a DC 40 Fortitude save or be [stunned 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) (stunned 4 on a critical failure). A creature that critically succeeds is temporarily immune for 24 hours. **Focus Gaze** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The eremite stares at a creature they can see within 30 feet. The creature must immediately attempt a Will save against Paralytic Perfection. In addition, if the creature was already [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), on a failed save, its unnatural longing causes it to become [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9). After attempting this save, the creature is then temporarily immune until the start of the eremite's next turn. **Graft Flesh** **Requirement** The eremite holds a piece of flesh they collected via Evisceration; **Effect** The eremite attaches the stolen flesh to themself. They either regain 100 Hit Points; reduce the value of their [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) condition by 3; or reduce the stage of any affliction affecting them by 3. **Shadow Traveler** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47)) When an eremite uses [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) or [_shadow walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=275), they arrive at exactly their intended destination.
